title: Sheet‑Pan Chicken & Broccoli
ingredients: chicken breast 2 lb; broccoli florets 6 cups; olive oil 2 tbsp; garlic powder 2 tsp
steps: Toss all on a sheet pan. Roast 20–25 min at 425°F.

title: Tuna Quinoa Bowls
ingredients: canned tuna 3 cans; quinoa 2 cups (cooked); cucumbers 2; greek yogurt 1/2 cup; lemon 1
steps: Mix yogurt, lemon, dill for sauce. Combine with tuna, quinoa, cucumbers.
